### Rationale

Currently, it is not possible to reinstall or delete a package declared in an environment spec matrix:

https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/environments.html#spec-matrices

This is a blocker for reinstalling a given package in the matrix within the environment. The workaround for this is to uninstall the package globally, then reinstall it within the environment.

### Additional information
This is accurate as of spack version 0.14.2.

### General information

- [x] I have run `spack --version` and reported the version of Spack
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Support for deleting packages declared in environment spec matrix
